37enum IneqType
38{
39 LESS_OR_EQUAL = -1, // less than or equal to
40 GREATER_OR_EQUAL = 1, // greater than or equal to
41 EQUAL = 0, // equal to
42 LESS = -2, // strictly less than
43 GREATER = 2 // strictly greater than
44};
